title: Nick Storch, booking agent
itunes:title: Nick Storch, booking agent
description:
Today we have one of the best booking agents in the game, Nick Storch from Artist Group International, on the show this week. We recorded this episode before the pandemic ground the music industry to a halt, but Nick's story is compelling nonetheless. We discuss him finding his way to booking, personal taste and how that affects who he works with and the music industry at large. Sit back, relax and enjoy!

Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
